data.name: LogRecord
desc: assembles the complete information about a to-be-logged event

items.name: Level
lines: specifies the level of the log event

items.name: LogTime
lines: specifies the time at which the event was logged

items.name: LoggerName
lines: specifies the name of the logger at which the record is logged

items.name: SequenceNumber
lines: specifies the number of the log event.
Subsequent events get assigned increasing sequence numbers by the XLogger at which they're logged.

items.name: SourceClassName
lines: specifies the name of the class, in which the record was logged.
This name might be empty, in case the caller to one of the various log methods of XLogger did not specify it.

items.name: SourceMethodName
lines: specifies the name of the method, in which the record was logged.
This name might be empty, in case the caller to one of the various log methods of XLogger did not specify it.

items.name: ThreadID
lines: specifies the ID of the thread in which the event was logged
